JUSTICE K.ABRAHAM MATHEW WEDNESDAY ,THE O9TH DAY OF JANUARY 2019 / 19TH POUSHA, 1940 Cri.MC.No. 192 of 2019 PETITIONER/S: KABEER P.M. AGED 45 YEARS s/o. MOIDU, CHAKKALAKATHOOT (H), CANAL ROAD, UCC COLLEGE, ALUVA, ERNAKULAM DISTRICT (OWNER OF AN EXCAVATOR JCB BEARING REGISTRATION NO.KL -25-8757) BY ADV. SRI.AJEESH M UMMER RESPONDENT/S: 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM 682 031 2 THE SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE, PERUMBAVOOR POLICE STATION, ERNAKULAM DISTRICT 683 542 3 THE DISTRICT COLLECTOR, ERNAKULAM DISTRICT 682 030 OTHER PRESENT: SRI C S HRITHWIK-SR PUBLIC PROSECUTOR 2019/KER/1027 Crl.MC.No. 192 of 2019 1.2... THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 09.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: ORDER Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C. 2. The petitioner claims to be the owner of a vehicle seized by the second respondent on the allegation of commission of the offence under the provisions of the Kerala Conservation of Paddy Land and Wet Land Act. The seizure has not been reported to the learned magistrate. The prayer is to direct the second respondent to report the seizure to the learned magistrate concerned. 3. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioner and the learned Public Prosecutor. 4. The petitioner may file an application under Section 457 Cr.P.C. before the competent court, which shall call for a report from the second respondent and pass appropriate orders Biehl ox, eae] pete Ebaedemals a 2019/KER/1027 Crl.MC.No. 192 of 2019 ..3., on it. With this direction, this Crl.M.C. is closed. Sd/- K.ABRAHAM MATHEW JUDGE APPENDIX PETITIONER'S/S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE 1 TRUE COPY OF THE SEIZURE MAHASSAR PREPARED BY THE SECOND RESPONDENT DATED 29.12.2018 IN CONNECTION WITH SEIZURE OF VEHICLE OF PETITIONER ANNEXURE 2 TRUE COPY OF THE ORDER DATED 7.2.2018 IN CRL M.C. NO. 8111/2018 Bka/10.01.2019
